nodes.text: The Ordo Moon Dragon was a species of nocturnal creature native to the Ordo Moon. It fed on raw energy. While repairing their shuttle after crash-landing onto the moon, the former clone troopers of Clone Force 99 encountered an Ordo Moon Dragon that stole their replacement capacitor. After distracting the dragon with a flashlight, the clone Omega was able to retrieve the capacitor.

Ordo Moon Dragons were accustomed to dark environments and were adept at moving through tunnels. They had dens that could be filled with various objects that they had consumed energy from. When feeding, an Ordo Moon Dragon's body would glow a green color. They had long bodies with long tails as well as several pointy teeth.
